verses.html:
1
Christ is coming!
Let creation from her groans and travail cease;
Let the glorious proclamation
hope restore and faith increase:
Christ is coming!
Christ is coming!
Come, Thou blessed Prince of Peace.

2
Earth can now but tell the story of
Thy bitter cross and pain;
She shall yet behold Thy glory,
When Thou comest back to reign:
Christ is coming!
Christ is coming!
Let each heart repeat the strain.

3
Long Thine exiles have been pining,
far from rest, and home, and Thee:
But, in heav’nly vestures shining,
they their loving Lord shall see:
Christ is coming!
Christ is coming!
Haste the joyous jubilee.

4
With that blessed hope before us,
let no harp remain unstrung;
Let the mighty advent chorus
onward roll from tongue to tongue: “Christ is coming!
Christ is coming!
Come, Lord Jesus, quickly come!”
